availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William N. Staples (Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and day laborer)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and day laborer. Virginia native. Married to Mary A. Guthrey Staples in Hopkins County, Kentucky, on June 3, 1857. Father of George G. Staples, Luellen Staples, and William F. Staples. Farmer in Union County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned six enslaved persons in Union County in 1850. Day laborer in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Uniontown, p. 404B.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 551A.

Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994039, Hopkins County Births.
